trans-unit.source:
To resolve this issue, please check the following things:

  • Is the 'rhn-tools' child software channel for this kickstart profile's base channel available to your organization? If it is not, you will need to request entitlements for the 'rhn-tools' software channel from your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ administrator.
  • Make sure that the 'rhn-tools' child channel for this kickstart profile's base channel is available to your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. If it is not, please contact your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ administrator and request a mgr-inter-sync for the rhn-tools channel and try again.
  • Make sure the spacewalk-koan package corresponding to this kickstart are available in the kickstart's base channel's 'rhn-tools' channel. If not, you will need to make them available for this kickstart profile to function properly.
  • Are the packages listed above available in this kickstart's base channel? If not, you will need to make them available for this kickstart profile to function properly.

To resolve this issue, please check the following things:

  • Is the 'appstream' child software channel for this kickstart profile's base channel available to your organization? If it is not, you will need to request entitlements for the 'appstream' software channel from your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ administrator.
  • Make sure that the 'appstream' child channel for this kickstart profile's base channel is available to your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. If it is not, please contact your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ administrator and request a cdn-sync for the appstream channel and try again.
